name: email-service-studio
description: This is a codebase for creating a email server.

scripts.lint: npx prettier src/. --write --check && npx eslint src/.
scripts.build:client: cp -rf client/ dist/client && cp -rf public/ dist/public
scripts.build:server: npm run lint && npx tsc && cp package.json dist
scripts.local-build: npm i && npx tsc --build --clean && npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && rm -rf app.zip && npm run build:server && npm run build:client

author: TsangSzeSze,CC
